channel.title: Motor Control Board Design Kicad on Alexander Cote
channel.description: Recent content in Motor Control Board Design Kicad on Alexander Cote

item.title: Stepper Motor Controller PCB
item.description: Designed a circuit board to control the forward and reverse motion of a 6-wire stepper motor driver. Gained practice with schematic capture, PCB layout and routing using KiCad. First design used through hole components. The updated version uses surface mount devices to allow for a smaller board design.
